topics.body:
So I read the translated lyrics to Me! Me! Me! the song actually makes a lot more sense now; it's about a otaku who put anime above his girlfriend and relationships and even though he's a stoner who doesn't have a life she's still waiting for him.

Basically don't put anime at a higher priority than your relationships.
